content.content: Hello friends, if you, like me, are new to this forum and still figuring out the functionality, I suggest that you help each other and answer our questions in this topic.

Hi! I’m still pretty new. But one of the first things I learned was about using my (self-delegated) OP to vote in Snapshot elections (governance proposals). I think there’s been an announcement that they are moving away from Snapshot towards on-chain voting with an Agora product (Transitioning to On-Chain Voting). But still:  Voting is really fun and satisfying, and makes you feel like part of the community & have skin in the game. Snapshot is rather easy to get the hang of  Here the link to anyone that want to have a go and play around Snapshot
